macro:
[gcode_macro START_PRINT]
gcode:
	{% set BED_TEMP=params.BED_TEMP|default([CHANGE_BED_TEMP])|float %}
	{% set EXTRUDER_TEMP=params.EXTRUDER_TEMP|default([CHANGE_EXTRUDER_TEMP])|float %}
	[ENABLE_PART_FAN]
	# Home the printer
	G90
	M83
	G28
	
	# Preheat the bed
	M140 S{BED_TEMP}
	M190 S{BED_TEMP}
	M104 S[CHANGE_EXTRUDER_TEMP][CHANGE_HEATSOAK][enable_bed_mesh_calibrate1][enable_leveling_option][enable_bed_mesh_calibrate2]
	
	# Heat the extruder to the desired temperature
	M104 S{EXTRUDER_TEMP}
	M109 S{EXTRUDER_TEMP}
	
	# Prime line sequence
	G1 Z5 F3000 ; lift
	G1 X20 Y5 F1500 ; move to prime position
	G1 Z0.15 F3000 ; get ready to prime
	G92 E0 ; reset extrusion distance
	G1 X[CHANGE_PRIME_MOVELENGHT] E30 F600 ; prime nozzle with adjusted extrusion / E__ based on how much you like
	
	# String removal circle after priming
	G1 Z0.2 F3000 ; adjust to 0.2mm above the bed
	G1 Y+15 F10000 ; move the toolhead in the Y direction by 15 units
	
	# Execute the circle 3 times
	G2 I-5 J0 F10000 ; circle with 5mm radius
	G2 I-5 J0 F10000
	G2 I-5 J0 F10000

enablePartFan.yes:
# Enables part cooling fan to stop duct from melting when waiting for bed temp
	M106 S153
